name: Ampichino
description:
'''Anthony Deon Hunt''' (born 1976), better known by his stage name '''Ampichino''' or '''Amp''', is an American rapper and producer from [[Akron, Ohio]]. His 2002 single "Do the Damn Thang" featuring [[Yukmouth]] peaked at #15 on the [[Rap Songs|Hot Rap Songs]] and [[Bubbling Under R&B/Hip-Hop Songs]] chart.

Ampichino is a member of the group [[The Regime (group)|the Regime]] and the collaborative effort Devilz Rejectz with [[The Jacka]] of [[Mob Figaz]].
